Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.

Plasma attacks with [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred] or [abilityred]Choking[/abilityred] now apply [abilityred]Immolation[/abilityred] instead, dealing {ImmoDamage} damage per turn. Immolation lasts for {ImmoTurn}.

Unit gains {IncreasedAcc}% accuracy on all attacks.[br/][br/]This unit's attacks get +{IncreasedBurningAcc}% accuracy and +{ExterminationExtraDamage}% damage against [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred] or [abilityred]Immolated[/abilityred] targets.
+{IncreasedAcc}% accuracy and +{IncreaseDmg}% damage against [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred] or [abilityred]Immolated[/abilityred] targets.
Restore {HealAmount}[hp/] and remove any non-Psionic Status Effects from this unit or target adjacent unit.
Provides the unit with a protective system, granting them +{BiochemicalResistance} resistance against status effects and [abilityblue]Tactical Hazard Immunity[/abilityblue].
When standing in Thermal Hazards, this unit deals +{PanelsDamageIncrease} damage and heals for {PanelsHealPerTurn}[hp/] at the start of each turn.

When standing in Thermal Hazards, this unit deals +{PanelsDamageIncrease} damage and heals for {PanelsHealPerTurn}[hp/] at the start of each turn.[br/][br/]Unit also gains +{DefenseThermal}[defenseThermal/] resistance and immunity to [abilityblue]Thermal Status Effects and Tactical Hazards[/abilityblue].

This unit is absorbing the PyrX fire it is standing in, charging its systems. The unit's damage is boosted by {PanelsDamageIncrease} and it heals for {PanelsHealperTurn} as long as it is standing in PyrX fire.
Directs a focused shockwave at a target, [abilityred]knocking back[/abilityred] Light units.
Launch a projected Force Blast that bursts in a {hexrange} hex radius area.
Fire a Plasma Bomb, dealing damage in a {hexrad} hex radius area and leaving behind a burning Hazard for {plasmaBombDuration}.
Fire a Phoenix Bomb, dealing damage in a {hexrad} hex radius area and leaving behind a burning Hazard for {plasmaPhoenixDuration}.
Fire a burst of ignited plasma at a target, setting the target hex on fire for {PlasmaDuration}[turn/].
Fire arrows that ignite with plasma midair, igniting the target hex for {PlasmaDuration}[turn/].
Fire rapid bursts of ignited plasma at a target, setting the target hex on fire for {PlasmaDuration}[turn/].
Fire a burst of a thick plasma-smog mixture, setting the target hex on fire for {PlasmaDuration}[turn/].
Dvar knowledge of plasma mining tools was applied to weapons development, increasing damage by {PlasmaMasteryDamage}.
Edit: creation of weapon --> weapons development
Use plasma to lash out at a target.
This unit quickly surges to another hex, dealing damage to all adjacent units when it lands.
When damaged, this unit pulses fire around itself, dealing {backlashDamage} damage to all adjacent enemy units.

Boost the power of your [abilityblue]Fallout Protection Shielding[/abilityblue] until the start of the next turn, granting an additional {BoostShields} and {BoostResistance} resistance.[br/]This effect is canceled if this unit is staggered.
This unit has been provided with extra protection and has gained {FalloutShields} more Shields and {FalloutThermalResistance} resistance.
The unit projects a dome that protects it and all adjacent friendly units. The dome grants +{FalloutShields}, +{FalloutThermalResistance} resistance and Immunity to Thermal Status and Hazard Effects.

This unit is receiving protection from a nearby Aegis Tank. It gains {FalloutShields} Shields and {FalloutThermalResistance} Thermal resistance as well as immunity to Thermal Status and Hazard Effects.
Extend a focused flame, hot enough to cut through anything.
Unleash liquid flame on all hexes within {HexRange} hex range, setting the ground on fire for {HazardDuration}[turn/].
Spread a large torrent of flames in a {hexcon} hex cone area.

Drops a bomb in tactical combat that disperses a PyrX cloud in a {PyrXGasBombRadius} hex radius area. Biological and Cyborg ground units caught in the cloud are inflicted with [abilityred]Choking[/abilityred]. After {Timer}[turn/], the cloud explodes, dealing {ExplDamage} damage with [abilityred]Massive Impact[/abilityred].
Summon a Plasmoid unit onto the strategic map.
Your satellite has successfully deployed a Plasmoid unit onto the surface. All of their systems are operational.

Deploy a protective shield on target unit, granting the unit +{ShieldShieldingDefenses}, [abilityBlue]Stagger Immunity[/abilityBlue] and [abilityBlue]Thermal Immunity[/abilityBlue] for {EmergencyShield} turns. The unit cannot move for the duration of the effect.
This unit has +{shields} and Thermal Immunity, but cannot move.

All friendly units gain [abilityblue]Aegis Protection[/abilityblue], granting them +{AegisProctShield}, as well as +{AegisThermalResistance} and +{AegisBiochemicalResistance} resistance for {DeployFalloutShieldingTime} turns.
The unit has +{aegisshield} as well as {AegisThermalResistance} and {AegisBiochemicalResistance} resistance.

Call in an airstrike that deals {FirestormDamage} damage to a target with [abilityred]High Impact[/abilityred]. The projectile also deals {FirestormAdjacentDamage} damage to all adjacent enemy units and leaves a PyrX Hazard on all affected hexes for {FirestormTurns} turns.

Target friendly colony is defended by a Superheated Plasma Ray. For the first {numTurns} of combat, {minNumber} to {maxNumber} random non-Mineral and non-Ethereal units have a strength {strength} chance to become [abilityred]Immolated[/abilityred] every [turn/].
Plasma Ray Defense procedures have been brought online and all systems are functioning as expected. Any assailants should be repelled significantly more easily.
Every tactical [turn/], {minNumber} to {maxNumber} random non-Mineral and non-Ethereal units have a strength {strength} chance to become [abilityred]Immolated[/abilityred] in this colony's domain.

A strike drone showers the enemy in napalm. Deals damage equal to {IncinerationProtocolDamage} of their current [hp/], and weakens their [defensethermal/] resistance by {IncinerationProtocolsResistance} in combat for {IncinerationProtocolsDuration} Strategic [turn/].[br/][br/]On failure, will only deal damage equal to {IncinerationProtocolDamage} of their current [hp/].
Your drone strike has hit its target with full effect. The enemy army has suffered significant damage and will be less resistant to further thermal assault.
The enemy was more prepared for the drone strike than anticipated. Although they did not suffer the full effect of the bombardment, they still took some damage.
Promethean attack drones have bombarded your army, inflicting significant damage and weakening their resistance against further thermal assault.
Promethean attack drones attempted a bombardment on your army, but were thwarted by your troops. Though the strike did not have its full effect, we did sustain some damage.
This unit is affected by a recent Incineration Strike and its Thermal Resistance is reduced by {IncinerationStrikeResistance}.
Affected units lost {DamagePercentage} of their current [hp/]
Affected units have {ThermalWeakness} less [defensethermal/] resistance for {Duration} strategic [turn/].

Fire a rapid-ignition missile at the target sector that damages enemy units for {ProportionalDamage} of their current [hp/] and turns the sector into a Volcanic sector. If this operation targets an enemy Colony Core, it removes {Colonists Removed}[population/] Colonists from the target.
We have successfully initiated a PyrX flash strike.
Our PyrX flash strike missile malfunctioned and only dealt minimal damage.
We have been attacked by a vicious PyrX flash strike and have sustained heavy casualties!
Our enemies tried to target us with a PyrX flash strike, but only a marginal amount of damage was inflicted.
On failure, only deals {FailureDamage} and kills {ColonistAmount} [population/].
Affected units lost {DamagePercentage} of their current [hp/]

It is our duty to cleanse all of the galaxy's impurities, and we will do so without hesitation.[br/][br/]Your units deal {ExtraDamage} extra damage. This is increased to {ExtraXenoDamage} when fighting Xenoplague.
Your units do {ExtraDamage} extra damage. This is increased to {ExtraXenoDamage} when fighting Xenoplague.

The vault still holds the protocols for post-purge colonization - these could help with our colonization efforts in hazardous terrain.[br/][br/]All of your Colonies ignore economic penalties from Hazards and Volcanic.

Phoenix armament theory promotes efficiency above all else.[br/][br/]Promethean units are {PrometheanProduction} cheaper to build and their upkeep cost is reduced by {UpkeepRedec}.[br/][br/][firecol]Unit costs can never be lowered more than 75%.[/firecol][br/][firecol]Unit upkeep can never be lowered more than 50%.[/firecol]

We must keep hostiles away from our borders and out of reach of our colonies until we can unleash the full potential of the PyrX.[br/][br/]Your units gain {ExtraArmor}[armor/] within your Domain and you gain {OperationalDefense}[operationdefense/].
Your units gain {ExtraArmor}[armor/] within your Domain.
Ignite the atmosphere to purify the planet.
Non-Promethean player Biological and Cyborg units have [abilityred]Choking[/abilityred] in combat.[br/]PyrX fires appear in combat.
Floods a non-Promethean enemy colony with PyrX gas for {duration}, which increases in strength as you build more PyrX Refineries.
Our PyrX bombs have struck true, flooding the enemy colony with gas and spreading panic amongst the populace.
Our PyrX bombs have been deflected by enemy defensive systems. Although the bombs themselves failed to detonate, the close call has caused panic in the streets of the target colony.
The enemy have deployed some type of gas bomb on one of our cities. A dense, flammable gas covers the streets, leading to panic and frequent explosions!
Our defensive systems have deflected some type of gas bomb launched on our colony. Although the populace is safe, the close call has led to panic in the streets!

The PyrX Refinery unlocks the PyrX Fumigation Protocols Doomsday Weapon. Each additional PyrX Refinery you build increases the level of the weapon, making it stronger.[br/][br/]Only one PyrX Refinery may be built per Colony.
The final step in the Promethean plan floods the entire world's atmosphere with PyrX.[br/][br/]Requires PyrX Fumigation Protocols level 3.[br/]
PyrX gas now saturates the atmosphere while our people take shelter deep underground. It is only a matter of time before the cataclysm that marks the glorious rebirth of this planet.
One of our PyrX Refineries has been captured.
You have lost a PyrX Refinery!
You have lost a PyrX Refinery. Your attempt at Purifying the Planet has been canceled!
{STR_Player} has lost a PyrX Refinery. Their attempt at Purifying the Planet has been foiled!
A Player has started releasing PyrX into the atmosphere to begin purifying the planet!
By building a PyrX Refinery, {playerName} now has access to their Doomsday Weapon, the Planetary Purification. It is weak now, but will become more powerful as more PyrX Refineries are constructed.

By building a second PyrX Refinery, {playerName} has strengthened their Doomsday Weapon, the Planetary Purification. You should plan raids to destroy these structures before their weapon becomes too powerful.

By building their final PyrX Refinery, {playerName} has maximized the strength of their Doomsday Weapon, the Planetary Purification. They are now close to unleashing it and winning the game. The time to strike is now!
The Doomsday Timer has been paused! You must reclaim the lost PyrX Refinery or you will lose your chance at purifying the planet!
The loss of a PyrX Refinery has canceled the Planetary Purification, ending the Doomsday Timer.
The loss of a PyrX Refinery has reduced the amount of PyrX that is released into the atmosphere, and has halted our Planetary Purification as a result.

Our enemies have activated their Doomsday Weapon and have started spreading PyrX across the planet. Your own Doomsday Weapon has been wiped out by the cataclysm. You have {numTurns} to destroy one of their PyrX Refineries or they will win the game.
Planetary Purification has started, and you will win the game in {numTurns} unless you lose one of your PyrX Refineries.
The Planetary Purification has started, and {playerName} will win in {numTurns} unless you can destroy one of their PyrX Refineries.
A PyrX Refinery has been captured! If it is destroyed, our Doomsday timer will be canceled. If you recapture the refinery, you will be able to resume the countdown.
A PyrX Refinery has been captured! If it is destroyed, the Doomsday timer will be canceled. If {playerName} recaptures their refinery, they will be able to resume the countdown.

{playerName} is preparing to unleash their PyrX and purify the planet, if they are allowed to finish then your own Doomsday Weapon will be wiped out, and {playerName} will be but one step away from total victory!
From the ashes of the Promethean fires rises a victor,[br/]and a new beginning for this world.[br/]Do not be consumed by the corruption,[br/]or the next pyre may be your own.
The unit has specially-designed thermal armor which gives it +{ThermalResistance} resistance and immunity against Thermal Hazards and Status Effects.
The unit has specially-designed thermal armor which gives it +{InfernoThermalResistance} resistance and immunity against Thermal Hazards and Status Effects.
This is now used for Backlash Projectors
This is now used for Backlash Projectors
This is now used for Backlash Projectors
This is now used for Backlash Projectors
This is now used for Backlash Projectors
This is now used for Backlash Projectors
